name: Grounded (MickeyG)
description:
A platformer where controlling the player controls the camera.

"Seeing everything is great now and then but not when you can't even find yourself, sometimes it helps to be a little more... grounded"

or something like that.

Controls: Arrow keys move, p to pause and get a better look, esc to quit;                  

This game is made using Unity and so can be played on Mac PC or Linux

Game and sprites created by MickeyG using Unity, the Unity help tutorials and aseprite

Also, the unity build option said that it would build for Windows, Linux and Mac but I have not been able to test this for Linux and Mac so please tell me if it does not actually work for Linux or Mac!

Song:

Bittersweet Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
